uiDefinition.description: The name of your storage account
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide the name of the storage account used for queues as it appears in the Azure portal

uiDefinition.description: The shared storage key of your storage account
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide a shared storage key for the storage account used for queues as it appears in the Azure portal

generalInformation.description: Azure Queue storage provides cloud messaging between application components. Queue storage also supports managing asynchronous tasks and building process work flows.
